span.span: Represents a text annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，請在其他註解，例如矩形和橢圓形註解，可以顯示的內部文字。Note that other annotations, such as rectangle and ellipse annotations, can display inner text.

MemberSignature.Value: public void BeginTextEditing ();
.method public hidebysig instance void BeginTextEditing() cil managed
Public Sub BeginTextEditing ()
public: void BeginTextEditing();
member this.BeginTextEditing : unit -> unit

summary.span: 開始讓使用者編輯註解文字。

span.span: Begins editing of the annotation text by an end-user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫這個方法，註解會顯示 [編輯] 方塊，可讓使用者編輯註解文字。After calling this method, the annotation displays an editing box that allows the user to edit the annotation text. 呼叫方法來以程式設計方式取消此模式。Call the method to cancel this mode programmatically. 請注意使用者點擊 Enter 鍵，如果的值時，將編輯也結束屬性是`false`，或當使用者按一下編輯方塊外的值是否`true`。Note that editing also ends when the end-user hits the Enter key if the value of the property is `false`, or when the end-user clicks outside the editing box if the value is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void EndPlacement ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void EndPlacement() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub EndPlacement ()
public: override void EndPlacement();
override this.EndPlacement : unit -> unit

summary.span: 結束讓使用者放置註解。

span.span: Ends user placement of an annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結束由先前啟動註釋放置作業方法呼叫。Ends an annotation placement operation previously started by a method call. 您不需要呼叫這個方法，因為當使用者輸入所需的所有點時，就會自動結束位置。You are not required to call this method, because placement will automatically end when an end-user enters all required points. 不過，最好的註解位置的作業需要中止，因為某些原因時。However, it is useful when an annotation placement operation needs to be aborted for some reason.

summary.span: 停止讓使用者編輯註解文字。

span.span: Stops end-user editing of the annotation text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法來取消編輯作業的呼叫所啟動的文字方法。Call this method to cancel a text editing operation that was started with a call to the method. 請注意，如果使用者按兩下註釋，則會自動呼叫方法。Note that if the end user double-clicks the annotation, the method will be automatically called.
